prompts: Create a futuristic Pokemon that has vibrant colors and a sleek body design.
I want a digital-themed Pokemon with unique shapes and a playful personality.
Generate an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a digital creature with bright colors.
Make a Pokemon that combines technology and nature in its appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that can evolve from a virtual form into a more complex one.
Design a Pokemon that has a mix of red and blue, embodying a tech-savvy character.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it could exist in a computer simulation.

distinctive_features: Large eye with a digital look
